Game.Name: Kong - King of Atlantis (USA)
Game.plot: The race to save the islands of Kong and Atlantis is on! Jason and Lua need to convince Kong that Queen Reptilla is using him to unite warring clans of Atlantis for her own evil gains - before it's too late!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/930471.htmlCheat: Level PasswordsUse at the Password screen.
